summary.span: 提供工作流程單一執行個體的主機。

span.span: Provides a host for a single instance of a workflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供工作流程單一執行個體的主機。The class provides a host for a single workflow instance. 這是工作流程執行階段管理的實際工作流程執行個體所屬的 Proxy。It is a proxy to the actual workflow instance that is managed by the workflow runtime. 的使用者可指示工作流程執行階段呼叫 物件上適當的方法，以便在工作流程執行個體上執行動作。Users of can instruct the workflow runtime to perform actions on a workflow instance by calling the appropriate methods on a object. 如果要求的動作無效，就會擲回例外狀況。If a requested action is not valid, an exception is thrown. 使用 可執行下列工作：Using you can perform the following tasks: 1. 建立新的工作流程執行個體，或從執行個體存放區載入工作流程執行個體。Create a new workflow instance, or load a workflow instance from an instance store. 2. 提供工作流程執行個體中的活動使用的擴充。Provide extensions to be used by activities within a workflow instance. 3. 控制工作流程執行個體的執行。Control the execution of a workflow instance. 4. 繼續工作流程執行個體中的活動所使用的書籤。Resume a bookmark created by an activity within a workflow instance. 5. 保存或卸載工作流程執行個體。Persist or unload a workflow instance. 6. 接收工作流程執行個體開發週期事件的通知。Be notified of workflow instance lifecycle events. ## Examples 下列範例會使用 來裝載工作流程。The following example hosts a workflow using . 系統會使用指定的工作流程定義來建構 執行個體、處理所需的工作流程開發週期事件，並且透過呼叫 叫用此工作流程。A instance is constructed using the specified workflow definition, the desired workflow lifecycle events are handled, and the workflow is invoked with a call to . 當工作流程完成時，主控台就會顯示下列輸出。When the workflow is completed, the following output is displayed to the console. ```Output Starting the workflow. Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Idle. Ending the workflow. Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Completed Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Unloaded. ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#9)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會使用 來裝載工作流程。The following example hosts a workflow using . 系統會使用由單一 活動組成的工作流程定義來建構 `DiceRoll` 執行個體。A instance is constructed using using a workflow definition consisting of a single `DiceRoll` activity. `DiceRoll` 活動具有兩個輸出引數，這些引數代表擲骰作業的結果。The `DiceRoll` activity has two output arguments that represent the results of the dice roll operation. 當工作流程完成時， 處理常式就會擷取輸出，而且主控台會顯示下列輸出。When the workflow completes, the outputs are retrieved in the handler, and the following output is displayed to the console. ```Output Workflow aae3fb48-7229-4737-b969-d63e131b96b3 Completed. The two dice are 1 and 5. ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#130](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#130)] [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#21)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷取消作業是否成功，請呼叫。To determine whether the cancel operation was successful, call . 可以從 `callback` 方法之內或之外呼叫。 can be called from inside or outside of the `callback` method. 如果在取消作業完成之前呼叫 ，它會封鎖直到取消作業完成為止。If is called before the cancel operation completes, it blocks until the cancel operation completes. 根據預設，取消作業必須在 30 秒內完成，否則會從 擲回 。By default, the cancel operation must complete in 30 seconds or a is thrown from . 這個方法會使用 非同步設計模式來非同步取消工作流程。This method cancels a workflow asynchronously using the asynchronous design pattern. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步程式設計的概觀](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md).

A reference to the asynchronous operation

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可執行執行個體是計時器或執行個體鎖定已過期的執行個體。A runnable instance is an instance for which a timer or instance lock has expired. 若要判斷載入作業是否成功，請呼叫 。To determine if the load operation was successful, call . 可以從 `callback` 方法之內或之外呼叫。 can be called from inside or outside of the `callback` method. 如果在繼續作業完成之前呼叫 ，它會封鎖直到繼續作業完成為止。If is called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation completes. 根據預設，繼續作業必須在 30 秒內完成，否則會從 擲回 。By default, the resume operation must complete in 30 seconds or else a is thrown from . 這個方法會使用 非同步設計模式來非同步載入工作流程。This method loads a workflow asynchronously using the asynchronous design pattern. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步程式設計的概觀](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md).

A reference to the asynchronous operation

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可執行執行個體是計時器或執行個體鎖定已過期的執行個體。A runnable instance is an instance for which a timer or instance lock has expired. 若要判斷載入作業是否成功，請呼叫 。To determine if the load operation was successful, call . 可以從 `callback` 方法之內或之外呼叫。 can be called from inside or outside of the `callback` method. 如果在繼續作業完成之前呼叫 ，它會封鎖直到繼續作業完成為止。If is called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation completes. 如果載入作業沒有在指定逾時間隔內完成，則會從 擲回 。If the load operation does not complete within the specified time-out interval a is thrown from . 這個方法會使用 非同步設計模式來非同步載入工作流程。This method loads a workflow asynchronously using the asynchronous design pattern. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步程式設計的概觀](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md).

span.span: Persists a workflow instance to an instance store asynchronously using the asynchronous design pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步程式設計的概觀](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md). 如果先前已從持續性載入工作流程執行個體，則會使用用來載入工作流程的相同 做為保存。If the workflow instance was previously loaded from persistence, then the same used to load the workflow is used for persistence. 如果工作流程已建立但尚未保存，則必須在呼叫這個方法之前設定 ，否則呼叫這個方法時會擲回 。If the workflow was created and has not yet been persisted, then an must be configured before calling this method or else an is thrown when this method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷保存作業是否成功，請呼叫。To determine whether the persist operation was successful, call . 可以從 `callback` 參數中參考的方法之內或之外呼叫。 can be called from inside or outside of the method referenced in the `callback` parameter. 如果在保存作業完成之前呼叫 ，它會封鎖直到保存作業完成為止。If is called before the persist operation completes, it blocks until the persist operation completes. 如果保存作業沒有在 30 秒內完成，則會從 擲回 。If the persist operation does not complete within 30 seconds, a is thrown from . 如果先前已從持續性載入工作流程執行個體，則會使用用來載入工作流程的相同 做為保存。If the workflow instance was previously loaded from persistence, then the same used to load the workflow is used for persistence. 如果工作流程已建立但尚未保存，則必須在呼叫這個方法之前設定 ，否則呼叫這個方法時會擲回 。If the workflow was created and has not yet been persisted, then an must be configured before calling this method or else an is thrown when this method is called. 這個方法會使用 非同步設計模式來非同步保存工作流程。This method persists a workflow asynchronously using the asynchronous design pattern. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步程式設計的概觀](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md).

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查傳遞給 執行個體之 處理常式的 。The following code example inspects the passed into the handler of a instance. 在此範例中，處於閒置狀態的工作流程具有一個名為 且由名為 `EnterGuess` 之活動所擁有的 `ReadInt`。In this example the workflow going idle has one with a name of `EnterGuess`, owned by an activity named `ReadInt`. 這個程式碼範例基礎[如何： 執行工作流程](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/how-to-run-a-workflow.md)，這是屬於[入門教學課程[.NET Framework 4.5]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/getting-started-tutorial.md)。This code example is based off of [How to: Run a Workflow](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/how-to-run-a-workflow.md), which is part of the [Getting Started Tutorial [.NET Framework 4.5]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/getting-started-tutorial.md). 如果該步驟中的 處理常式修改為包含此範例中的程式碼，就會顯示下列輸出。If the handler in that step is modified to contain the code from this example, the following output is displayed. ```Output BookmarkName: EnterGuess - OwnerDisplayName: ReadInt ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當工作流程中有未處理的例外狀況時， 和 都會指定執行階段的行為，不過， 可以選擇離開持續性存放區中暫止的工作流程，而 不能。Both and dictate the behavior of the runtime when an exception is not handled in the workflow; however, has the option of leaving a suspended workflow in the persistence store, while does not. 這是因為暫止的工作流程所發生的情形是主機特定的情形，而 不是。The reason for this is that what happens to a suspended workflow is host-specific, and is not. 若要使用 來實作這個功能，請建立具有這個行為的自訂 。To implement this functionality using , create a custom that has this behavior. ## Examples 下列範例會叫用擲回例外狀況的工作流程。The following example invokes a workflow that throws an exception. 此例外狀況未由工作流程處理，而且叫用了 處理常式。The exception is unhandled by the workflow and the handler is invoked. 系統會檢查 以提供例外狀況的相關資訊，並且終止工作流程。The are inspected to provide information about the exception, and the workflow is terminated. remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫此方法以啟始執行最新建立的工作流程執行個體。Call this method to initiate execution of a newly created workflow instance. 如果執行作業沒有在 30 秒內完成，則會擲回 。If the run operation does not complete within 30 seconds, a is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會使用 來裝載工作流程。The following example hosts a workflow using . 系統會使用指定的工作流程定義來建構 執行個體、處理所需的工作流程開發週期事件，並且透過呼叫 叫用此工作流程。A instance is constructed using the specified workflow definition, the desired workflow lifecycle events are handled, and the workflow is invoked with a call to . 當工作流程完成時，主控台就會顯示下列輸出。When the workflow is completed, the following output is displayed to the console. ```Output Starting the workflow. Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Idle. Ending the workflow. Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Completed Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Unloaded. ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#9)]

span.span: Begins or resumes the execution of a workflow instance using the specified time-out interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，不同於 ，這個方法只會在工作流程未在指定的時間內啟動時逾時，而不是在必須於指定的時間內完成卻未完成時逾時。Note that unlike , this method will time out only if the workflow doesn't start in the specified amount of time, rather than needing to complete in the specified amount of time. 這是因為 會以同步方式 (封鎖主執行緒) 執行工作流程，而 是以非同步方式執行，即只封鎖主執行緒到工作流程啟動為止。The reason for this is that executes the workflow synchronously (blocking the host thread), while executes asynchronously, only blocking the host thread for the amount of time it takes the workflow to start. ## Examples 下列範例會使用 來裝載工作流程。The following example hosts a workflow using . 系統會使用指定的工作流程定義來建構 執行個體、處理所需的工作流程開發週期事件，並且透過呼叫 叫用此工作流程。A instance is constructed using the specified workflow definition, the desired workflow lifecycle events are handled, and the workflow is invoked with a call to . 當工作流程完成時，主控台就會顯示下列輸出。When the workflow is completed, the following output is displayed to the console. ```Output Starting the workflow. Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Idle. Ending the workflow. Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Completed Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Unloaded. ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#9)]

Workflow e6b33409-f010-49f1-82ce-56f8baabe5e5 Terminated. Exception: System.ApplicationException Terminating the workflow. span.span: Persists and unloads a workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，卸載作業必須在 30 秒內完成，否則會擲回 。By default, the unload operation must complete in 30 seconds or a is thrown. 如果先前已從持續性載入工作流程執行個體，則會使用用來載入工作流程的相同 做為保存。If the workflow instance was previously loaded from persistence, then the same used to load the workflow is used for persistence. 如果工作流程已建立但尚未保存，則必須在呼叫這個方法之前設定 ，否則呼叫這個方法時會擲回 。If the workflow was created and has not yet been persisted, then an must be configured before calling this method or else an is thrown when this method is called.

span.span: Persists and unloads a workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，卸載作業必須在 30 秒內完成，否則會擲回 。By default, the unload operation must complete in 30 seconds or a is thrown. 如果先前已從持續性載入工作流程執行個體，則會使用用來載入工作流程的相同 做為保存。If the workflow instance was previously loaded from persistence, then the same used to load the workflow is used for persistence. 如果工作流程已建立但尚未保存，則必須在呼叫這個方法之前設定 ，否則呼叫這個方法時會擲回 。If the workflow was created and has not yet been persisted, then an must be configured before calling this method or else an is thrown when this method is called. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例屬於[NoPersistScope 活動](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/nopersistscope-activity.md)範例。The following code example is part of the [NoPersistScope Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/nopersistscope-activity.md) sample. 在這個範例中，工作流程已閒置而且主應用程式正等候使用者輸入。In this example, the workflow is idle and the host application is waiting for user input. 如果使用者選擇卸載，就會呼叫 。If the user chooses to unload, is called. 如果呼叫成功，就會保存工作流程並從記憶體中卸載工作流程。If successful, the workflow is persisted and unloaded from memory. [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#20)]
